summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Crepe Planet luxury dessert restaurant website. All core features working correctly including navigation, language switching, WhatsApp integration, menu functionality, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Homepage hero section with WhatsApp CTA button links to correct number
Navigation between all pages (Home, About, Menu, Offers, Love Wall, Contact)
Language toggle switches between English and Arabic with RTL support
Menu page displays all three categories (crepes, pancakes, signature plate)
Menu items show correct prices in Lebanese Lira (L.L)
Floating WhatsApp button visible on all pages with correct link
Special offers page displays 4 offer cards with WhatsApp ordering
Love Wall displays 8 testimonials and functional comment form
Contact page has correct WhatsApp (+961 76 779 566) and Instagram (@crepe__planet) links
Footer contains proper social links and copyright
Mobile responsive design with working mobile menu
All WhatsApp links point to https://wa.me/96176779566
All Instagram links point to https://instagram.com/crepe__planet
Love Wall form submission shows success toast notification
Premium UI with deep green, olive, and gold color scheme
Bilingual support (EN/AR) with proper font handling
